title: Add Date writable underline to printed physician signature section

requirements.summary: When the physician signature toggle is enabled, render three labeled handwritten underline fields (Physician Name, Physician Signature, Date) in the printed reportâ€™s physician signature section.
acceptanceCriteria: With the toggle OFF, the printed report does not show the physician signature section.
With the toggle ON, the printed report shows three fields labeled exactly: "Physician Name:", "Physician Signature:", and "Date:".
Each of the three fields renders an underline line (matching the existing print signature line style) that provides space for handwriting when the page is printed.
No backend changes are required; the change is purely presentational in the print report component.

file_operations.description: Update the conditional (showPhysicianSignature) printed physician signature section to include a third field labeled exactly "Date:" and render it using the existing underline style class (print-signature-line) so it matches the current Physician Name/Signature handwritten lines.
